lead_paragraph: The series, started by Alan Gilbert, has emerged as an important part of the city’s musical and intellectual life, presenting 21 world premieres.

headline.main: New York Philharmonic Saves Contact! New-Music Series

snippet: The series, started by Alan Gilbert, has emerged as an important part of the city’s musical and intellectual life, presenting 21 world premieres....
abstract: New York Philharmonic decides not to cancel new-music series Contact! after outgoing music director Alan Gilbert expresses dismay and several donors affiliated with orchestra step up to fund curtailed season.
